column5: Heading to Morson for the opener of Sabaskong. Never been there in May. Still mainly jigs? I'm used to May fishing in MN with corks and jigs. What should be my plan?
If the ice goes off soon.... with a late opener, odds are jigs. If its a later ice out... they could be on beaches trolling.

In my mind it all depends on how you want to fish. That time of year we pitch jigs and troll rigs and when it's time for a break we go to slip bobbers and a jig. We always start in the Sandy areas with small rocks mixed in. We do alot of shallow fishing than. Less that ten foot.
